Title: Integrating Litmus Edge with Azure IoT Operations
Summary: This Drop shows how to use Litmus Edge together with Azure IoT Operations. A better together story.
Description: This Drop provides a guide to integrate Litmus Edge with Azure IoT Operations. It describes how to deploy Litmus Edge on an Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes cluster, configure the Litmus Edge agent to send data to the MQTT broker of Azure IoT Operations, and monitor the data in Azure IoT Operations.
